page.title: 12LIFE 1
page.content: {A Day in the life of Mrs. Bennett.} Mrs. Bennett is our school cook and dinner lady. The group I work in interviewed her. Mrs. Bennett lives in Lydd Green and she likes living there. At school she enjoys talking to the children.At home she enjoys going to dog shows and walking in the peacefullness of the countryside. In her spare time she likes watching television, Knitting, going for walks, going to dog shows and doing odd jobs. In the morning she gets up early and does odd jobs in the house, then she goes to school. (Continued on Page 13, Life 2.)
